resources.string: Your password on Facebook has changed, please reconnect the app with Facebook.
An error occurred when connecting with Facebook, please reconnect the app with Facebook.
Please log in via https://www.facebook.com or https://m.facebook.com to re-enable the app to connect with Facebook.
An app connection with Facebook failed due to insufficient permissions, please grant the app permissions to perform the operation.
The app is not connected with Facebook, please log in and reconnect this app.
An app connection with Facebook failed due to insufficient permissions.
Are you sure, you want to Logout?
